Text: With which scene release group does this DLC work? Razor1911? KaOs? Black Box?
i'm sure it works with razor - that's what i have.
Don't be silly, guys. While this is technically a DLC it's really just updated graphics so this does not require ANY particular version of Skyrim. It just overwrites images.
It works! Skyrim looks way better now! :D
after which update can i install this?
